channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Trump administration just proposed its first animal to be added to the endangered species list: a rare fish from Nevada that’s ‘barely clinging to existence’
item.description: At the same time, the Trump administration has been trying to eliminate habitat protections for endangered and threatened species.

item.title: With Elon Musk in attendance, South Africa’s president counters Trump for pushing a baseless conspiracy theory about ‘white genocide’: ‘This I’ve never seen’
item.description: Musk's Grok AI was recently caught referencing the same "white genocide" conspiracy theory, unprompted, to unrelated user questions.

item.title: Vitamin D supplements may slow down your biological clock, new study finds
item.description: A deeper look at how Vitamin D could protect against age-related decline.

item.title: Bitcoin touches all-time high and Treasury yields cross 5% again
item.description: Bitcoin soared to record levels before dropping like a stone later in the day. U.S. equities saw their positive streak cut short.

item.title: Three Sentenced for Luring Gay-Bar Robbery Victims to Their Deaths
item.description: The men were convicted of murder, robbery and conspiracy in what prosecutors described as a “deadly hustle” that targeted patrons at night spots in Ma...

item.title: Freddy Lim, Frontman of Chthonic, Is Taiwan’s New Envoy to Finland
item.description: Freddy Lim, the founder and lead singer of Chthonic, is well known in Finland, a heavy metal capital of the world.

item.title: Trump Lectures South African President in Televised Oval Office Confrontation
item.description: President Trump showed a video and leafed through printouts of what he said was evidence of racial persecution of white South Africans. The country’s ...

item.title: How a Water Conservation Idea Won Over Oklahoma Farmers
item.description: Haunted by memories of the Dust Bowl, Oklahoma farmers have adopted conservation practices that have helped to revive about 100 streams.

item.title: Gen Z is tired of hearing they’re lazy and will only work remotely: ‘People talk about us but not to us’
item.description: Leaders of the youngest generation think it’s in employers’ best interest to hear them out.

item.title: Israeli Soldiers Fire Warning Shots to Disperse Western Diplomats Touring West Bank
item.description: The event in Jenin, in the Israeli-occupied West Bank, came amid rising tensions between Israel and its foreign partners.

item.title: Thursday Briefing: Trump Lectures South Africa’s Leader
item.description: Plus, everyone is moving to Chengdu.

item.title: Don’t Mention Climate: Now, Clean Energy Is All About the Money
